name: happy_path_youtube_review
description: Tests the happy path for a YouTube review request.
user_message: Create an outreach message for @techreviewer, a Tech YouTuber with 500K subscribers, for a product review of our new smartphone.  We want an honest review and offer creative freedom. The tone should be professional but friendly.

name: instagram_sponsored_post_sustainable
description: Tests a sponsored post request for an Instagram influencer focused on sustainability.
user_message: Draft an outreach message for @fashionista, an Instagram fashion influencer with 200K followers, for a sponsored post promoting our sustainable clothing brand. Emphasize our sustainability focus, desire for authentic style, and potential for a long-term partnership. Use a casual and approachable tone.

user_message: Okay so like, there's this influencer, @beautyguru, they do makeup stuff on Instagram, they have a lot of followers, maybe like 300k? We want them to promote our new lipstick, it's really cool and long-lasting, and we want them to say nice things about it, but like, in their own style, you know? Make it sound friendly and stuff.
